timeline.bodyText: nit: why not make BulkLoadHFiles.BULK_LOAD_HFILES_BY_FAMILY public, then remove this variable here?
timeline.author: wchevreuil

timeline.bodyText: Is this really needed? Isn't BULK_LOAD_HFILES_BY_FAMILY loaded as false by default if not set on LoadIncrementalHFiles#195? Or perhaps you can move this for a separate method that could be overridden by  TestLoadIncrementalHFilesByFamily to avoid duplicating whole setUpBeforeClass in the child class?
timeline.author: wchevreuil

timeline.bodyText: Does this test class actually make sense, without testing the specific new logic added? I mean, even without the group by family feature this test class will pass, so it's not shielding us from inadvertently changes on the new feature.
timeline.author: wchevreuil

replies.bodyText:
yes, I delete this test , and add testBulkLoadByFamily ut .
bulkloadbyFamily only change client side , this config has no affect with server side . no need start another minicluster use different conf for test
replies.author: nyl3532016
